Description
===========
  PlayStreaming illustrates how to play a wave file using a DirectSound 
  streaming buffer.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Src\PlayStreaming

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Bin

User's Guide
============
  Load sounds and adjust the playback properties with the dialog controls.

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was intended to be very simple, showing the basics of playing a
  sound using the DirectSound API through a streaming buffer.
